items.instruction: Remove Office 365 license from the user
Ensure mailbox has been removed from all distribution groups
Setup auto response (ensure you include the logo) on departing user's email account with forwarding contact details
Remove user from all distribution groups
Move user's home folder to ex staff folder
Change Network Access Permission to Deny Access
Schedule yourself in 4 weeks to remove the auto response
Remove alias from mailbox so that it bounces
Ticket can be closed once alias is removed and mail bounces
